results.content: This course is very new so there are some bugs to work out.  Nevertheless, I was very impressed with how quickly the instruction integrated HTML5, CSS3, jQuery, and Bootstrap.  The pace is a little fast so it may not be a good choice for novice learners.  However, it offers the intermediate level web designer a chance to start using the latest technologies all at the same time.  Very impressive!  With a few revisions, this will be a great tutorial course.
